title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 5, ch. XIV, pt. 143 - Work Force Diversity Requirements And Procedures Regarding Equal Employment Opportunities For Minority Group Members And Women On State Contracts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 5, ch. XIV, pt. 143 - Work Force Diversity Requirements And Procedures Regarding Equal Employment Opportunities For Minority Group Members And Women On State Contracts

State Regulations
§ 143.1 - Purpose, scope and applicability
§ 143.2 - General work force diversity requirements for State agencies awarding contracts
§ 143.3 - Work force diversity bidding and award requirements
§ 143.4 - Contractor work force diversity compliance
§ 143.5 - Work force diversity reporting requirements for contracting agencies
§ 143.6 - Work force diversity dispute resolution procedure

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 5, ch. XIV, pt. 143

Statutory authority: Executive Law, §§ 313[2], [2-a], 313-a

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
